system.description:
The poisons, enzymes, and phages your body produces are a force of nature. Your Attacks ignore a creature’s resistance to poison damage and your Attacks treat a creature’s immunity to poison as if it was only resistance to poison damage.

At level 10, if you hit a creature without any immunity or resistance to poison damage with your @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.Item.t4fBlBaiSejL8KVX]{Sanguine Transference}, any poison damage from any source that creature takes until the end of your next turn is treated as though the creature is vulnerable to poison damage.
